title: PMS 2.0 318 - MNF Recap, Aaron Rodgers, Charles Davis, Tom E. Curran, Mark Madden, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys react to the Steelers potentially being dead, where they go from here, JuJu dancing on logos and getting smacked in the mahth, why the offense seems like it stinks/ if it actually does, and much more. Joining Pat and AJ like he has every Tuesday, the Quarterback of the Green Bay Packers, potential NFL MVP, Aaron Rodgers to chat about his game against the Panthers, how he's feeling about the Packers heading into the playoffs, he and AJ remember Kevin Greene, and much more (24:08-41:28). Next, Charles Davis joins the program to chat about the Steelers and whether or not they can turn things around, who he thinks can give the Chiefs a run in the AFC, his thoughts on the Packers and the Saints, and everything else going on in the NFL as we close in on the playoffs (41:30-1:03:02). Later, NBC Sports Boston analyst, and friend of the program Tom E. Curran joins the show to chat about the Patriots season, his relationship with Bill Belichick, where the Patriots go from here (especially at QB), and much more (1:05:42-1:17:46). Lastly, Pittsburgh Radio Icon, The Super Genius, Mark Madden checks in from Vegas to talk about the Steelers, if they're dead, JuJu dancing, and much more (1:17:48-1:34:20). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
